name: NIGHTMARES (itch) (Anthony Ibrahim)
description:
Welcome to NIGHTMARES!

Nightmares is my new room based game. Each room is a mystery with zombies and wizards. Slash your magical sword to slay all the enemies and save the village.

Do not forget to pass by the magic stones scattered around the game to earn new abilities. When you gather enough points, head to the shop keeper to find out what can you unlock. On each run you can choose different abilities to unlock.

When you reach the end, you will face the mighty Nightfall. Kill her and her allies to end the game.

Best of luck! Your support is highly appreciated.

How to play?

Left Mouse Button - Sword Attack

Right Mouse Button - Range Attack

P - Pause

Shift - Dash
